attributes.action: 16-18 year olds not able to get into uni without a C in English Language
attributes.background: 16-18 year olds are forced to do English Language if they have a D in GCSE because they need a C to get into university although they aren't wanting to do an english based subject, 16-18year olds should have a choice.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
